title: The fastest way to charge your phone without damaging the battery
description: Batteries and fast charging are at the core of our favorite smartphones. As weve seen in the past, improving a phones battery can be a dangerous task, so fast charging requires a delicate balance. But, how does fast charging actually work and how might it improve in the future? We take a look at the quickest way to charge your current phone...and your next phone.
